articles.title: Hubble Sees Galaxy in a Ghostly Haze - NASA
articles.description: The lenticular galaxy NGC 6684 bathes this image from the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope in a pale light.

articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: The Sun Has Been Emitting High-Energy Gamma Rays In Huge Quantities! | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: The emissions equate to approximately 1 trillion electron volts, making it the highest-energy radiation to ever be documented from our solar system’s star!
